text: A pest is an animal which harms humans or human concerns.Mirriam-Webster dictionary, 2010. It is a loosely defined term; it overlaps with the terms vermin, weeds, parasites and pathogens. In its broadest sense, a pest is a competitor of humanity. == Top ten pests == According to BBC News Science & Environment, these are among the top ten pests of plants: BBC News Science & Environment Fungi are prominent in their list, and it is more usual to call them pathogens. #Desert locust Schistocerca gregaria #Rubber blight Microcyclus ulei #Corn root worm Diabrotica virgifera virgifera #Potato blight Phytophthora infestans, an Oomycete #Khapra beetle Trogoderma granarium #Mountain pine beetle Dendroctonus ponderosae #Wheat stem rust Puccinia graminis tritici #Colorado beetle Leptinotarsa decemlineata === Serious beetle pests === *Emerald ash borer *Boll weevil *Maize weevil *:cotton weevil: == References == Category:Biology
title: Pest (biology)
